Well, hurricanes are basically like big heat engines.
And over the years we've gained a great deal of knowledge in telling the public where hurricanes are going.
In other words, our hurricane track forecasts are quite good.

By looking inside the storms, essentially popping the hood, if you will, we can actually see the engine.
